original_text: “But if he pushed him suddenly without enmity, or hurled anything on him without lying in wait
korean_text: 악의가 없이 우연히 사람을 밀치거나 기회를 엿봄이 없이 무엇을 던지거나

sentences.original_text: But if he pushed him suddenly without enmity
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 그가 원한 없이 갑자기 그를 밀았거나

sentences.original_text: or hurled anything on him without lying in wait
